oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Edited Hansard. 41st Parl.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: N/A
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This dataset consists of 1 .zip archive of XML files and 1 .txt file. Unzipping the archive will create a folder containing 1 XML file for each debate during the 41st Parliament. The individual file names correspond to an internal numbering convention on line 21 of the document. The .txt file is a master file containing all of the XML files with the tags removed.
